Export.Routine:
INMORevTable
#include COMSYS #include INConst #include %occInclude
ShowItems(pidEvent,pidParameters) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; ; Called By : ; ; Inputs : ; ; Params: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 11-May-2010 PPP SR16573: Created ; ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new idKey,lstColTypes,lstHeaders,objItem,objItemPolicy,objLocn new strFunction,strGridLineYFORM,strIssue,strIssueLine,strStatus new idRev new idRevLine new objRev new objRevLine new idItem new idIssue
kill ^CacheTempDynamicTable(YUCI,YUSER,"dBundle")
set strGridLineYFORM = $$$DYNTABLEGridLineFocusGrid(pidParameters) set idKey = $$ReferenceKey^COMGridEdit31Interface(strGridLineYFORM,$$$DYNTABLEGridLineFocusRow(pidParameters)) set idRev = $$$KEY1(idKey) set idRevLine = $$$KEY2(idKey)
if '$$Editable^INMORev(idRev) quit // *** EARLY EXIT ***
set strStatus = $$GetLock^WWWMultiLock("INMORev",strGridLineYFORM,idRev_$$$COMMA_idRevLine) ; FIXME : strStatus is not checked <GRF>
set objRev = $$$GRIDYFELDContainer set objRevLine = $$$GRIDGetYFELD(idRevLine)
; Load Lookup objects ;set objIssueLine = ##class(alISS.dUIssueLine).%OpenId("0||"_idIssue_"||"_idIssueLine,0) //set objLocn = ##class(alLOC.dLocation).%OpenId($$$INIssueFromLocn(strIssue))
set idItem = $$$INMORevLineItem(objRevLine) set objItem = ##class(alINV.dItem).%OpenId(idItem,0)
if objItem'=$$$NULLOREF { set objItemPolicy = objItem.ItemPolicy set strFunction = "FillLine" set strStatus = $$BuildDynTableHeader(objItemPolicy,.lstHeaders,.lstColTypes)
;HEVA-1686.2 set idIssue=$order(^INIssues(YM,6,$$$Index(idRev),"")) set idIssue=$order(^INIssues(YM,6,idRev,"")) ;HEVA-1686.2
do BuildDynTableRows(idItem,idIssue)
; setup JS Callback if $$$ISERR(strStatus) { write "function "_strFunction_"() {" write "alert('"_$$$JSText($$$Text(strStatus))_"');" write "}" } else { write "function "_strFunction_"() {" write "CallBack(""SelectBundle^INMORevTable"", getRowNum(getFocusField()), this.DiscData[0]);" write "}" } do DrawTable^WWW120DynTable(lstHeaders,"dBundle",lstColTypes,pidParameters,strFunction,pidEvent,"SelectBundle^INMORevTable") }
quit $$$OK
BuildDynTableHeader(pobjItemPolicy,&plstHeaders,&plstColTypes) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Setup Table Headers ; (1) (2) (3) ; "Storage" Attribute Headings "Available Quantity" ; (e.g. "Lot Number") ; ; History: ; 11-May-2010 PPP SR16573: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new idAttrKey,objAttr,strAttrName
;--------------------------------------- 1
if (+$$$WWWClientParamCoreChangesALL($get(^WWWClientParam(YM,YM,1)))) { set plstHeaders = $listbuild("EndereÃ§o de armazenagem") }else{ set plstHeaders = $listbuild($$$Text("alISS0004")) ; "Stock Bundle" } set plstColTypes = $listbuild($listbuild("left","link"))
;--------------------------------------- 2
set idAttrKey = "" for { set objAttr = pobjItemPolicy.Attributes.GetNext(.idAttrKey) quit:(idAttrKey = "") continue:(objAttr.Attribute.Name="ReceiptNo")
set strAttrName = ##class(alINV.uiPolicyAttrTrans).GetText(objAttr.Attribute.Name,SPRACHE) //SR15698 set plstHeaders = plstHeaders_$listbuild(strAttrName) set plstColTypes = plstColTypes_$listbuild($listbuild("left","link")) }
;--------------------------------------- 3
set plstHeaders = plstHeaders_$listbuild($$$Text(32665)) ; "Available Quantity " set plstColTypes = plstColTypes_$listbuild($listbuild("right","link"))
quit $$$OK
BuildDynTableRows(pidItem,pidIssue) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Build an array "^CacheTempDynamicTable" which contains the lines corresponding ; to the headings in BuildDynTableHeader ; ; Params: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 11-May-2010 PPP SR16573: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new idAttrKey,idLine,idPolicyAttr,loopRS,objAttr,objBundleStock,objItem new objItemPolicy,objLocn,objPolicyAttr,objResultSet,strAttrValues new idIssLine new objIssueLine new idBundle new objBundle
set objItem = ##class(alINV.iUINV).GetItem(pidItem) //set objLocn = ##class(alLOC.iULOC).GetLocation(pidLocn)
//if (objItem '= $$$NULLOREF) && (objLocn '= $$$NULLOREF) { if (objItem '= $$$NULLOREF) { kill ^CacheTempDynamicTable(YUCI,YUSER,"dBundle") set objItemPolicy = objItem.ItemPolicy
set idIssLine="" for { set idIssLine = $order(^INIssueLine(YM,pidIssue,idIssLine)) quit:idIssLine=""
set objIssueLine = $get(^INIssueLine(YM,pidIssue,idIssLine,1)) continue:$$$INIssueLineItem(objIssueLine)'=pidItem
set idBundle = $$$INIssueLineBundle(objIssueLine) set ^CacheTempDynamicTable(YUCI,YUSER,"dBundle",$increment(idLine),"data") = idBundle
set strAttrValues = "" //objBundleStock.Storage.Code_Y if (+$$$WWWClientParamCoreChangesALL($get(^WWWClientParam(YM,YM,1)))) { set strAttrValues = $$SQLGetEnderecoArmaz^VARSQL(idBundle)_Y }else{ set strAttrValues = idBundle_Y } set objBundle = ##class(alSOH.dBundle).%OpenId(idBundle,0)
set idAttrKey = "" for { set objAttr = objBundle.Attributes.GetNext(.idAttrKey) quit:(idAttrKey = "")
set idPolicyAttr = objBundle.ItemPolicy.Attributes.FindObjectId(objBundle.ItemPolicy.%Id()_"||"_objAttr.AttributeName) set objPolicyAttr = $$$NULLOREF set:(idPolicyAttr '= "") objPolicyAttr = objBundle.ItemPolicy.Attributes.GetAt(idPolicyAttr) continue:(objAttr.AttributeName="ReceiptNo")
if ((objPolicyAttr '= $$$NULLOREF)) && (objPolicyAttr.Attribute.DataType = "%Date") { set strAttrValues = strAttrValues_$$^WWWDATE(objAttr.AttributeValue)_Y } else { set strAttrValues = strAttrValues_objAttr.AttributeValue_Y } }
;------------------------------- 3
set strAttrValues = strAttrValues_$$$INIssueLineQtyIssued(objIssueLine) set ^CacheTempDynamicTable(YUCI,YUSER,"dBundle",idLine) = strAttrValues } } quit $$$OK
SelectBundle(pidRow,pidKey) ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; ; Params: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 11-May-2010 PPP SR16573: Created ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------- new objBundleStock,sc,strIssue,strIssueLine,YFORM
set strIssue = $$$GRIDYFELDContainer set strIssueLine = $$GetYFELDEX^COMGridEdit31Interface("INMOIssueLine",$$$GRIDYKEYContainer_","_pidRow) do SetRecord^COMGridEdit31S1("INMOIssueLine",pidRow,$$$FldINMORevLineBundle_$$$COMMA_pidKey)
quit
